trans-unit.source: Retrieves exports provided by a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Recupera le esportazioni fornite da una raccolta di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider> class consults the providers in the order in which they have been specified when it calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider.GetExports%2A>.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>classe consulta i provider nell'ordine in cui sono state specificate durante la chiamata a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider.GetExports%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider.GetExports%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider> does not take ownership of the specified providers.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>non accetta la proprietà del provider specificati.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: That is, it tries to dispose of any of the providers when it is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Vale a dire, tenta di eliminare qualsiasi provider di quando viene eliminato.

trans-unit.source: The prioritized list of export providers.
trans-unit.target: L'elenco in ordine di priorità dei provider di esportazione.

trans-unit.source: The providers are consulted in the order in which they are supplied.
trans-unit.target: I provider vengono consultati nell'ordine in cui vengono forniti.

trans-unit.source: One or more elements of providers are .
trans-unit.target: Uno o più elementi di providers sono .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider> class consults the providers in the order in which they have been specified when it calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider.GetExports%2A>.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>classe consulta i provider nell'ordine in cui sono state specificate durante la chiamata a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider.GetExports%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider.GetExports%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider> does not take ownership of the specified providers.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>non accetta la proprietà del provider specificati.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: That is, it tries to dispose of any of the providers when it is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Vale a dire, tenta di eliminare qualsiasi provider di quando viene eliminato.

trans-unit.source: The prioritized list of export providers.
trans-unit.target: L'elenco in ordine di priorità dei provider di esportazione.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dall'istanza corrente del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare `Dispose` quando si è terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il `Dispose` metodo lascia la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata `Dispose`, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>occupata.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre `Dispose` prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider"></xref> class and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider"> </xref> classe e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Gets all the exports that match the conditions of the specified import.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene tutte le esportazioni che corrispondono alle condizioni di importazione specificata.

trans-unit.source: Implementers should not treat cardinality-related mismatches as errors and are not expected to throw exceptions in those cases.
trans-unit.target: I responsabili dell'implementazione non devono considerare le mancate corrispondenze correlate alla cardinalità come errori e non possono generare eccezioni in tali casi.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the import requests exactly one export and the provider has either no matching exports or more than one, the method should return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'importazione richiede esattamente un'esportazione e il provider ha non esportazioni corrispondenti o più, il metodo deve restituire una <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>raccolta <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> di vuota

trans-unit.source: The conditions of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Le condizioni del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The transactional container for the composition.
trans-unit.target: Il contenitore transazionale per la composizione.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all the exports that match the specified condition.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta che contiene tutte le esportazioni che soddisfano la condizione specificata.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the providers that the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider"></xref> object aggregates.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta che contiene i provider che il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider"> </xref> aggregati dall'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> objects that the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider"></xref> aggregates.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"> </xref> gli oggetti di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider"> </xref> aggregazioni.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider"></xref> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateExportProvider"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.
